channel.title: Help with a command i made

item.title: Help with a command i made
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“I r Pwn u, post:6, topic:307594”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=403747.msg2989247#msg2989247 date=1255203001]
Heh, this is what I was thinking, I used to love making commands like this on my old server a few years back

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sellabyssalwhip")) && if(hasItem(4151)) { deleteItem("4151"); addItem("995, 26000000"); sendMessage("You sold your abyssal whip for 2.6M coins!"); }

That probably wouldn’t even work on anything but uh just an example
[/quote]

lol, it’s a 508 server not 317 :P[/quote]I know, that’s why I said it would only work with 317.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command i made
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I’d imagine you use something like

if hasItem(4151) then Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 4151, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 2000000);

I’m not completely sure what you’d use, I’ve never touched a 508 TBH but have a look around and try do what you can do with what I’ve given you, I know what I’m thinking will work on a 317 but not sure about 508s.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a command i made

item.title: Help with a command i made
item.dc:creator: @jrs0804 jrs0804
item.description:
@jrs0804 wrote:

hi i was working on a command to sell stuff i have a 508 btw, u type in ::sellabyssalwhip and itll take ur abyssal whip and give you money

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“sellabyssalwhip”) && p.rights > 0) {
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 4151, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 2000000);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<img=1><col=fff000><shad=0202>Grand exchange finished!<img=1>”);

my question is, how can i make it so u HAVE to have an abyssal whip b4 you can sell it coz right now wenever you type it it just gives you 2mil even if you dont have an abyssal whip, thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a command i made
